statements: SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT assignment_title, student_name, grade, graded_at FROM Assignments JOIN Grades ON Assignments.assignment_id = Grades.assignment_id JOIN Students ON Grades.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY graded_at DESC;
